src:
Virus pokosio 12 igrača Radničkog, odložen sudar sa Proleterom
Trener Kosanović u neverici

07 Nov 2019

Radnički je zamolio, Superliga izašla u susret. Utakmica između Proletera i Radničkog zakazana za ovaj vikend neće biti odigrana zbog toga što je stomačni virus pokosio dobar deo ekipe Milorada Kosanovića.
I nije šala, Kosanovićev tim je zaista desetkovan, pošto zbog stomačnog virusa ne bi mogli da igraju Nermin Haskić, Stefan Mihajlović, Lazar Đorđević, Ivan Ostojić, Rebin Sulaka, Dušan Pantelić, Filip Knežević, Rjota Noma i Marko Knežević. Na sve to dodajte još trojicu čija imena zasad nisu objavljena.
Kako bilo...“Imamo velike probleme koji su krenuli u ponedeljak. Sve je eskaliralo u utorak kada je otpalo devet igrača, da bi im se jutros pridružila još trojica. Još uvek ne znamo šta je. Da li je grip, stomačni virus ili su igrači nešto loše pojeli u Senti (pre ili posle meča sa TSC-om, prim. aut.). Obaviće se pregledi pa ćemo znati tačan uzrok. U svakom slučaju, mi smo desetkovani i teško je raditi u ovakvim uslovima. Situacija je trenutno takva da mi nećemo imati igrače da igramo utakmicu u subotu.  Sve je krenulo od golmana Marka Kneževića, posle njega se razboleo Nikola Čumić, a kada smo se vratili iz Sente nastao je pravi haos. Kada sam jutros došao na trening nisam mogao da verujem šta vidim i koliko igrača nam nedostaje. Ne smemo ništa prepustiti slučaju, rekao sam im da nikako ne dolaze na stadion, ne bi li se sačuvali ovi koji su ostali zdravi“, rekao je juče Kosanović.
Naknadni termin odigravanja utakmice još nije poznat.
(FOTO: Star Sport)
text:
Virus killed 12 workers, delayed collision with Proletarian
Coach Kosanovic in disbelief

07 Nov 2019

Worker asked, Superliga came out to meet. The match between Proleter and Radnicki scheduled this weekend will not be played because the stomach virus has killed a good part of Milorad Kosanovic's squad.
And no joke, Kosanovic's team is indeed decimated, as the stomach virus could not play Nermin Haskic, Stefan Mihajlovic, Lazar Djordjevic, Ivan Ostojic, Rebin Sulaka, Dusan Pantelic, Filip Knezevic, Ryota Noma and Marko Knezevic. Add to this all three others whose names have not been released yet.
Anyway ... "We have big problems that started on Monday. It escalated on Tuesday when nine players were dropped, with three more joining it this morning. We still don't know what is. Is it the flu, the stomach virus or did the players eat something bad in Senta (before or after the TSC match, cf. auto). Reviews will be done so we will know the exact cause. In any case, we are decimated and it is difficult to work in these conditions. The situation is currently such that we will not have players to play the game on Saturday. It all started from goalkeeper Marko Knezevic, Nikola Čumić got sick after him, and when we returned from Senta, a real chaos ensued. When I came to training this morning, I couldn't believe what I was seeing and how many players we were missing. We must not leave anything to chance, I told them that they did not come to the stadium in order to preserve those who remained healthy, "Kosanovic said yesterday.
The subsequent date of the match is not yet known.
(PHOTO: Star Sport)
